categories.name: Boot Issues
categories.description: Problems related to system startup and boot processes

questions.title: Computer won't boot or start
questions.description: System fails to power on or boot properly

questions.title: No internet connection
questions.description: Unable to connect to the internet or network

questions.title: Computer running slowly
questions.description: System performance is degraded or sluggish

solutions.text: Check if the power cable is securely connected to both the computer and the power outlet.
Try a different power outlet or power cable if available.
Press and hold the power button for 10 seconds, then try turning it on again.
Check if other devices can connect to the same network.
Restart your router by unplugging it for 30 seconds, then plugging it back in.
Check Task Manager (Ctrl+Shift+Esc) to see if any programs are using too much CPU or memory.
